item.title: Server Compiling Errors
item.dc:creator: @Hodgie2010 Hodgie2010
item.description:
@Hodgie2010 wrote:

I’m new to coding and I’ve come across a slight problem that I can’t figure out. ;cry;

[code] }

	default:
		if(c.playerRights == 3)
			Misc.println("Player used Item id: "+itemUsed+" with Item id: "+useWith);
		break;
	}	
}
public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) {
	switch(itemId));
		break;
	}		
		
	default:
		if(c.playerRights == 3)
			Misc.println("Player used Item id: "+itemId+" with Npc id: "+npcId+" With Slot : "+slot);
		break;
	}
	
}

}
[/code]

I believe it’s something to do with this part of the code, please help! :palm:

Read full topic
